reviews.review: Historia larga y envolvente. Ambiente un tanto tenebroso e inseguro. Juego madre de muchos otros. Un clásico que si no lo tenes es por que no conoces lo que estas perdiéndote.

Played this game to completion recently. It hasn't aged nearly as well as its successor and the final levels suck. For its time, it was a much needed innovation in the FPS genre, now it is a mediocre, decently storied shooter. Worth your while, just try to be patient.

Described as legendary, this game from Valve really has something. If you look back when was it created you will be astonished with level of details in gameplay, graphics and story this game has. Even if primary category of this game is action FPS, this game also creates climate of good thriller, from usual jumpscares through uncomfortable noises to omnipresent death of your fellow NPCs, level design, music, graphics and everything else it contains. Recommended
Awesome game and a timeless classic! The game mechanics hold up well even on today's standards. A must play for everyone who plays on the PC.
The one, the only, the original! If you haven't played this where have you been?

我们曾经都拥有完整而疯狂的信仰，只是渐渐被生活磨平了，磨碎了，残缺了。信仰不会轻易地完全丢掉，除非从内部被不可抗拒的因素毁灭。长大，乃至逐渐老去，我们失去了太多东西，我们望着一点点流走的信仰，却无法挽回……
даже в самых новых играх нет таких возможностей, все ломается, не только квестовые предметы, можно включить компьютер хотя за ним кто-то сидит

For a game that was released more than two decades ago, Half-Life as a game holds up to modern standards; perhaps not in graphics but definitely with gameplay and story. While it lacks some of the polish commonly found in modern games, it is a must play for any interested in the early period of modern gaming.

I would recommend buying this while on sale, as it is often less than a dollar, and bundled with its expansions for less than a dollar and a half.

First and best game in the series. Despite its age, Half Life was a genre-defining shooter and thus doesn't feel much different from a modern one. This game also shows why controllers and FPS games don't work well. I miss this time in gaming. It was something magical.
